title: Self-Directed Competency Enhancement Workshop for Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Knowledge and Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning strategy training for working professionals aiming to strengthen science-related job competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can design science content navigation and selective learning pathways on MOOC platforms with 80% accuracy
Learners can establish weekly learning plans and achieve actual execution results at or above 70%
Learners can independently complete data analysis and reporting processes using scientific experiment simulation tools

resources: Zoom account with real-time session features
Access rights to science domain MOOC platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
